allow_discount_codes.description: Whether to allow the customer to apply discount codes. If you apply a discount through `discount_id`, it'll still be applied, but the customer won't be able to change it.
allow_discount_codes.title: Allow Discount Codes

client_secret.title: Client Secret

code.title: Code

max_redemptions.title: Max Redemptions

oneOf.description:
A recurring price for a product, i.e. a subscription.

**Deprecated**: The recurring interval should be set on the product itself.

product_id.description: The ID of the product owning the price.

recurring_interval.description: The recurring interval of the price.
recurring_interval.title: SubscriptionRecurringInterval

source.description: The source of the price . `catalog` is a predefined price, while `ad_hoc` is a price created dynamically on a Checkout session.
source.title: ProductPriceSource

prices.title: Prices

recurring_interval.description: The recurring interval of the product. If `None`, the product is a one-time purchase.

recurring_interval_count.description: Number of interval units of the subscription. If this is set to 1 the charge will happen every interval (e.g. every month), if set to 2 it will be every other month, and so on. None for one-time products.
recurring_interval_count.title: Recurring Interval Count

trial_interval.description: The interval unit for the trial period.

trial_interval_count.description: The number of interval units for the trial period.
trial_interval_count.title: Trial Interval Count

items.title: CheckoutLinkProduct

require_billing_address.description: Whether to require the customer to fill their full billing address, instead of just the country. Customers in the US will always be required to fill their full address, regardless of this setting.
require_billing_address.title: Require Billing Address

success_url.description: URL where the customer will be redirected after a successful payment.
success_url.title: Success Url

trial_interval.description: The interval unit for the trial period.

trial_interval_count.description: The number of interval units for the trial period.
trial_interval_count.title: Trial Interval Count
